title: The Temple House unveils SPA Mi Xun and Tea House
text:
The Temple House unveils SPA Mi Xun and Tea House The Temple House unveils SPA Mi Xun and Tea House Details Category: Hotel   11:00 The House Collective, known for its offering of refined, intimate and personalised experiences in luxury travel, has opened its first spa at its third hotel, The Temple House in Chengdu. Nestled within a former monastery built over 100 years ago, SPA Mi Xun combines a modern design within a historic setting, creating an urban oasis for guests to unwind, relax and indulge in premium wellness experiences. 
Mi Xun offers a range of genuine high-performance, results-driven treatments using quality spa brands including Natura Bissé, Mesoestic, Thémaé and Refinery. The spa also offers nail and waxing services, body treatments, rejuvenating facials and relaxing massages. Measuring 2,000 ft², Mi Xun includes a retail outlet, Gentlemen’s barber shop and 11 treatment rooms. Guests who are tight on time can opt for one of four express treatment rooms, while those who seek pure indulgence will delight in one of five deluxe spa suites or one of two VIP experience suites. The gift shop and Tea House at Mi Xun are designed to give guests the Mi Xun experience to take home and a post treatment space to enjoy a healthy lunch, tea or fresh juice. Related articles
